message.content: {"given_definition_quality":40,"better_definition":"child; son; also used as a noun suffix.","sentence":"他是我的儿子。","image_prompt":"Draw a young boy and his father together, with the boy looking happy and pointing at himself while the father places a hand on his shoulder. The background shows a calm family home interior. Render in a soft apocalypse animation style, with gentle lighting and muted pastel colors, focusing on their bond and the concept of 'son.'","sentence_translation":"He is my son."}
